attributes.action: Reinstate Dvla Certificate of Permanent Export
attributes.additional_details:
The certificate of export (v561) is essential for exporting vehicles permanently out of the UK.

There has not been any options put in place 

We would like this certificate to be restored immediately 

Pending the outcome of the Brexit decision in October 2019
attributes.background: The Certificate of permanent export was withdrawn in January 2019 with no explanation we have gathered it was withdrawn because of brexit

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that the relevant form has been withdrawn because it is no longer required, so we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

There's advice about what you need to do if you're taking your vehicle out of the UK here:

https://www.gov.uk/taking-vehicles-out-of-uk

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. You'll need to give your full name or first initial and surname.
